links.description: Donald Trump's threat to impose tariffs on an additional $200 billion of imported Chinese goods could see China retaliate with a wide range of non-tariff barriers. links.title: These are the reasons why millions of millennials can't buy houses
links.description: Homeownership eludes millions of millennials. A new report by the Urban Institute, a policy research group, tries to explain why. There are a whole host of reasons, including personal preferences and economic disadvantages, that explain why the homeownership rate for the largest generation in U.S. history is lower than that of their parents and grandparents.
